body.name: Long Handle Broom with Upright Standing Dustpan Combo for Office Home Kitchen Lobby Floor Cleaning
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 14 hrs 2 mins
features: No Bending Clean Up: Adjustable handles with room for variety based on your needs offer comfortable sweeping instead of bending over. Sturdy construction and rustproof .
Dustpan Teeth: The dustpan built in comb teeth is easy to scrape off the hair and rubbish of the broom silk into dustpan, no need to drag by hand, making the broom and dustpan easier to clean.
Saving Place: The broom can be attached to the dustpan buckle for stability. You can hang the broom and dustpan set on the wall, providing easy access and storage without taking up added space.

Efficient Cleaning: The broom is made of multi-layer firm bristles, which grabs hair and dirt into the dustpan. 45 degree bevel can clean the dirt and crumbs in the corners and crevices at will. The dustpan seals to the floor and no dirt gets swept beneath it when using it.

Multi-Occasion Use: Upright dustpan and broom set can be used in many occasions, including kitchen, bedroom, bathroom, lobby, office, garden, garage, classroom, dorm room and etc. It is made to hold both wet and dry debris. It is convenient for our daily use and keep everything tidy and clean.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Features Product Type Broom and Dustpan Set for home Material used Stainless steel and quality plastic Product advantage Buckle integrated design Handle Tip Yes, larger hanging hole on both handles Product features Adjustable height/Self contained comb Extendable 37"-49" Broom Head Width 11" Applicable scenario Office, home and etc

Stainless Steel Handle The broom/dustpan handle is made of quality stainless steel . Tighten rods. Sturdy and durable. Bevel Design 45 degree bevel design fits the wall corner，which makes corner dirt easier to clean. Self Contained Comb The dustpan has its own comb teeth to clean the hair and dirt on the broom without hands.

Quality Dense bristles The broom is made of multi layer dense fine bristles, sweeping the floor without ash leakage. Easy to Store The long broomstick can snap on the dustpan for upright storing. Easy access and storage. Comfortable Sweeping The broom is of humanized design. You can sweep your floor with ease and comfort instead of bending down and hurting your back. If your want to tidy your home and office, the REEWII broom and dustpan set is your smart choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great tool for anyone who wants to keep their floors clean and tidy
reviews.reviewText: The Upright Dust Pan Combo Sweep Set is a great tool for anyone who wants to keep their floors clean and tidy. This set includes a broom and a dustpan that can be easily assembled together to create an upright and ergonomic cleaning tool.One of the best things about this sweep set is its ergonomic design. The broom and dustpan are both designed to be used while standing upright, which means you don't have to bend over to sweep and collect dirt and debris. This makes it much easier on your back and knees, especially if you have a lot of sweeping to do.The broom itself is made of high-quality materials and features durable bristles that are great for sweeping up all kinds of debris, including dust, dirt, and small pieces of trash. The dustpan is also well-designed, with a deep and wide collection area that makes it easy to sweep up even large piles of dirt and debris.Another great feature of this sweep set is its compact and lightweight design. The broom and dustpan can be easily disassembled for storage or transport, and they don't take up much space. This makes them great for small apartments or homes where storage space is at a premium.Overall, the Upright Dust Pan Combo Sweep Set is a great cleaning tool that is both effective and easy to use. Its ergonomic design, durable materials, and compact size make it an excellent choice for anyone who wants to keep their floors clean without straining their back or knees.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight. Easy to use!
reviews.reviewText: The dustpan is sturdy and the handle is a good height! The broom is light weight and easy to use, they clip together and is very sturdy as well!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Constructed of less sturdy materials than I would have liked but it does the job at reasonable price

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works just fine
reviews.reviewText: Not too hard to assemble seems pretty good to me I've had no issues with it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good for an easy job
reviews.reviewText: Handle broke after about three uses of the broom. The pan works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dusty to the Rescue
reviews.reviewText: it is a very nice broom and the slanted bristles are god for hard places.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Might as well buy both Broom and stand up dust pan
reviews.reviewText: Great purchase needed a stand up dust pan cause I have a bad back. And it came with a great broom too. It was the cheapest one I could find cause the stand up dust pan was also sold by itself and it was a lot more than the broom and the dust pan. What's up with that?!?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: cheap quality , smaller than what I expected .
